comment.author: 37996646559@N01
comment._content: Hey, what are those thin, smaller towers with the so-'70s white borders to the right of the WTC?

comment.author: 13117626@N03
comment._content: I visited New York as a child about a month after this photo was taken.  I remember seeing them and asking what they were.  An older african-american gentleman told me that they were the World Trade Center towers.  He seemed proud.

comment.author: 27151228@N04
comment._content: I love these shots. They take my breath away.

comment.author: 73545709@N03
comment._content: That parking lot is now a wonderful, albeit exclusive, family-oriented community.

comment.author: 21893396@N00
comment._content: Wow!  That very first building on the right-hand side is where I now live :-)
